1.0.name: wordpress/mulubox
1.0.description:
Turn your blog into a more useful destination with muluBox. Illustrate, deepen and monetize your pages with shoppable ads.

Features

  • On-page commerce, while earning display ad revenue.
  • Products automatically pulled from your unique content.
  • Option to share your support for your favorite cause.

How it works

muluBox scans the content of your page, and returns products relevant to your content. Learn more at mulu.me.
